faq.description: Find answers to the most common questions about our products, shipping, returns, and more.
faq.question1: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer1: We accept cash on delivery (COD) for all orders. Payment is made when you receive your order at your doorstep.
faq.answer2: Standard shipping typically takes 3-7 business days depending on your location. You will receive a tracking number once your order is shipped so you can monitor its progress.
faq.answer3: We offer a 7-day return policy. If you're not satisfied with your purchase, you can return it within 7 days of delivery. Items must be unused and in their original packaging.
faq.question4: How can I track my order?
faq.answer4: Once your order is shipped, you will receive an order number via email. You can use this number to track your order status in the 'My Orders' section of your account.
faq.answer5: Currently, we ship within Turkey. For international shipping inquiries, please contact our customer service team.
faq.question6: What if I receive a damaged or defective product?
faq.answer6: If you receive a damaged or defective product, please contact us immediately. We will arrange for a replacement or full refund at no extra cost to you.
faq.question7: Can I modify or cancel my order?
faq.answer7: You can cancel your order within 24 hours of placing it. After that, if your order has already been processed, please contact our customer service team for assistance.
faq.question8: How do I add items to my wishlist?
faq.answer8: Simply click the heart icon on any product you like. You can view all your saved items in the 'Wishlist' section. You need to be logged in to use this feature.
